English: Defines the game display mode, whether it will remain in full screen or not.[n][n]Default: On[n][n]Warning:[n]- The "Bordeless window" option may not work if there is more than 1 screen.

English: Defines whether the language of the game will match the language of the user's operating system.[n][n]Warning:[n]- The game must be restarted for the change to be applied, otherwise, the change will not be applied;[n][n]- The game will only match the languages available in the "Language" option.
Українська: Defines whether the language of the game will match the language of the user's operating system.[n][n]Warning:[n]- The game must be restarted for the change to be applied, otherwise, the change will not be applied;[n][n]- The game will only match the languages available in the "Language" option.

English: A piece of a Demon Cleric's skull. So powerful that, even though it's constantly flaming, it won't fall apart. A blacksmith can use this bone to forge another charge of Demon Chalice, thanks to a gift that the Demon Sorcerers have given to all blacksmiths in Hell, which makes them able to manipulate the bones of Demon Clerics.

English: The blood of extinct Demon Clerics, wrapped in an absurdly powerful magical barrier. The only way to give it up is to grant it to a Cinder Totem, a totem created in the First Great Demon War, one of whose objectives was to channel the blood of the Demon Clerics into the medicines and healing spells of the Demon Sorcerers in order to avoid as much deaths as possible.
Українська: The blood of extinct Demon Clerics, wrapped in an absurdly powerful magical barrier. English: Its owner, the famous and old Vinsir, together with the warriors of the Congregation of Darkness, battled against the Darkness to bring peace to Earth. He created calm and inspiring melodies to relieve his stress and that of his allies in this eternal war against the Dark. One day, Vinsir and his fellow fought against a great Fingran consumed by the Dark. His allie managed to win the battle and free the great beast's soul, but at the cost of sacrificing Vinsir's life. Today, in the Great Field of Ardiflowers, lies the tomb of the heroic composer.

English: The sheet is extremely old and worn, but still perfectly legible:[n]"Hello, next adventurer, I'm glad you've also found this area, near this letter there is a purple totem. It is able to restore your vigor and cure any illness by resting near it and believing in its gift.”
Українська: The sheet is extremely old and worn, but still perfectly legible:[n]"Hello, next adventurer, I'm glad you've also found this area, near this letter there is a purple totem. It is able to restore your vigor and cure any illness by resting near it and believing in its gift.”

English: The sheet is burnt, but it is possible to read part of it:[n]"...Due to its distance from the center of hell, being extremely cold and icy, it is almost impossible to survive without great preparation, such as warmer clothes and fires, for example. However, it wasn't always like this, the Fifth Layer was once the hottest of all, and had a king, the King of the Underground, Drensriel, who soon after winning his title, betrayed Mounds by trying to kill him to become the King of Hell. However, he was clearly defeated, Mounds is ruthless, there is no beating him... So the fifth layer has been moved as far away from the center as possible, as a way of showing that Mounds will show no mercy to anyone who goes against him..."
Українська: The sheet is burnt, but it is possible to read part of it:[n]"...Due to its distance from the center of hell, being extremely cold and icy, it is almost impossible to survive without great preparation, such as warmer clothes and fires, for example. However, it wasn't always like this, the Fifth Layer was once the hottest of all, and had a king, the King of the Underground, Drensriel, who soon after winning his title, betrayed Mounds by trying to kill him to become the King of Hell. However, he was clearly defeated, Mounds is ruthless, there is no beating him... So the fifth layer has been moved as far away from the center as possible, as a way of showing that Mounds will show no mercy to anyone who goes against him..."

English: The sheet is torn and a little bit burnt, but still legible.[n]"...With his powers, Mounds creates a great flowery field, more than 500 billion kilometers long, in an attempt to imitate his old home, The Heavens. But the attempt failed in the blink of an eye. Mounds, furious, yells so loudly that the entire field is brutally burnt. The flowers, turned to ash. Trees, melted into lava. Flawed animals, turned into heaps of rotting flesh..."
Українська: The sheet is torn and a little bit burnt, but still legible.[n]"...With his powers, Mounds creates a great flowery field, more than 500 billion kilometers long, in an attempt to imitate his old home, The Heavens. But the attempt failed in the blink of an eye. Mounds, furious, yells so loudly that the entire field is brutally burnt. The flowers, turned to ash. Trees, melted into lava. Flawed animals, turned into heaps of rotting flesh..."

English: The leaves are torn and a little burnt, but still legible.[n]"...His disciples, Doalpus and Alreeis, finished the construction. Finally, after 134 years, it was erected and ready to demonstrate the power and architecture of hell, Moundzian Castle, the domain of Mounds... In the castle's laboratory, Mounds and his disciples created, from the blood of Mounds and a female mammal, Mounds' maiden, Astrina... Once married, Mounds and Astrina had 4 children, called the first demonic beings, who, when they came of age, were given the title of Demon Leaders..."
Українська: The leaves are torn and a little burnt, but still legible.[n]"...His disciples, Doalpus and Alreeis, finished the construction. Finally, after 134 years, it was erected and ready to demonstrate the power and architecture of hell, Moundzian Castle, the domain of Mounds... In the castle's laboratory, Mounds and his disciples created, from the blood of Mounds and a female mammal, Mounds' maiden, Astrina... Once married, Mounds and Astrina had 4 children, called the first demonic beings, who, when they came of age, were given the title of Demon Leaders..."

English: A dead warrior, who due his honorable death in battle, has a body. However, were cruel in life, his everlast sentence is now fight forever against his equals, as a memory of his last moments of life, feeling every pain and the burden of causing so much suffering in life as.[n][n]Due the new dictatorship of Mounds, all the dead are now gradually growing stronger and becoming demons. Therefore, when they complete the transformation, they will be part of the army of Mounds in the attack to the Human Realm.
Українська: A dead warrior, who due his honorable death in battle, has a body. However, were cruel in life, his everlast sentence is now fight forever against his equals, as a memory of his last moments of life, feeling every pain and the burden of causing so much suffering in life as.[n][n]Due the new dictatorship of Mounds, all the dead are now gradually growing stronger and becoming demons. Therefore, when they complete the transformation, they will be part of the army of Mounds in the attack to the Human Realm.

English: A huge and muscular dead warrior, killed in battle, so he keeps his body even in hell. However, for every place he passed, he caused desgrace. Now, forever, he will suffer in battles, remembering of his last moments of life and suffering his burden of the torments that caused in life.[n][n]Due the new dictatorship of Mounds, all the dead are now gradually growing stronger and becoming demons. Therefore, when they complete the transformation, they will be part of the army of Mounds in the attack to the Human Realm.
Українська: A huge and muscular dead warrior, killed in battle, so he keeps his body even in hell. However, for every place he passed, he caused desgrace. Now, forever, he will suffer in battles, remembering of his last moments of life and suffering his burden of the torments that caused in life.[n][n]Due the new dictatorship of Mounds, all the dead are now gradually growing stronger and becoming demons. Therefore, when they complete the transformation, they will be part of the army of Mounds in the attack to the Human Realm.

English: A golem forged from volcanic stones and magic that fought in the First Demon War. They usually use very powerful hammers or large flaming axes.[n][n]Eldaron, in a battle in the war, ended up getting lost, falling into the abandoned Fourth Layer of hell and was never found.
Українська: A golem forged from volcanic stones and magic that fought in the First Demon War. They usually use very powerful hammers or large flaming axes.[n][n]Eldaron, in a battle in the war, ended up getting lost, falling into the abandoned Fourth Layer of hell and was never found.

English: I'm... a merchant... What do you want?
Українська: I'm... a merchant... What do you want?

English: Now I live alone selling goods.
Українська: Now I live alone selling goods.

English: Hey hey hey! Take it easy, boy.
Українська: Hey hey hey! Take it easy, boy.

English: You are another one of those who came here because of that annoying witch, are not you?
Українська: You are another one of those who came here because of that annoying witch, are not you?

English: Try once more, die once more... Be reborn once more.
Українська: Try once more, die once more... Be reborn once more.

English: What are you so much planning, witch?
Українська: What are you so much planning, witch?

English: Try once more, die once more... Be reborn once more.
Українська: Try once more, die once more... Be reborn once more.

English: What are you so much planning, witch?
Українська: What are you so much planning, witch?

English: I'm Randalya, I saved you from that flaming monster.
Українська: I'm Randalya, I saved you from that flaming monster.

English: I guess you've met those purple totems, haven't you? I'm afraid the one next to that demon has already broken...
Українська: I guess you've met those purple totems, haven't you? I'm afraid the one next to that demon has already broken...

English: Those totems are called Cinder Totems, they are totems of worship that, when you rest on them and believe in their power, they restore your vigor and any tribulation in your body, as well as being able to increase your strength, store your luggage and transfer you to other totems you've already found.
Українська: Those totems are called Cinder Totems, they are totems of worship that, when you rest on them and believe in their power, they restore your vigor and any tribulation in your body, as well as being able to increase your strength, store your luggage and transfer you to other totems you've already found.

English: Your current equipment has been well worn out due to your arrival in hell. On the second floor of this building you will find a room with some equipment.
Українська: Your current equipment has been well worn out due to your arrival in hell. On the second floor of this building you will find a room with some equipment.

English: But remember that it's not only you who will need equipment, choose just one of each peace. Other warriors have recently arrived in hell, more warriors than usual, even...
Українська: But remember that it's not only you who will need equipment, choose just one of each peace. Other warriors have recently arrived in hell, more warriors than usual, even...

English: This building is home to others like me who can help you whenever you need it.
Українська: This building is home to others like me who can help you whenever you need it.

English: That's all I have to say.
Українська: That's all I have to say.

English: May Moygo's blessing be with you.
Українська: May Moygo's blessing be with you.

English: You have already done so much for me... I ask you to offer me your help once again.
Українська: You have already done so much for me... I ask you to offer me your help once again.

English: I imagine you have heard about Mounds, the Demon King, the fallen celestial being.
Українська: I imagine you have heard about Mounds, the Demon King, the fallen celestial being.

English: From my rituals, I discovered that he himself is preparing to invade the Earth, the realm of the living
Українська: From my rituals, I discovered that he himself is preparing to invade the Earth, the realm of the living

English: To dominate it, and then ascend to heaven again and become the supreme god.
Українська: To dominate it, and then ascend to heaven again and become the supreme god.

English: Nothing good will come of it, my brother. He will spread disgrace throughout the world, misery and suffering.
Українська: Nothing good will come of it, my brother. He will spread disgrace throughout the world, misery and suffering.

English: Therefore I ask, Massaru. You are the only one that I trust of body and soul to be able to face him, and then, defeat him.
Українська: Therefore I ask, Massaru. You are the only one that I trust of body and soul to be able to face him, and then, defeat him.

English: Through my witchcraft, I send you to hell.
Українська: Through my witchcraft, I send you to hell.

English: In the Character Info menu, you can check your status, level, attributes, attack power and more.[n][n]The information here reflects on your attacks and your damage negation against various types of damage, such that it can be increased by the armor and weapons you equip.
Українська: In the Character Info menu, you can check your status, level, attributes, attack power and more.[n][n]The information here reflects on your attacks and your damage negation against various types of damage, such that it can be increased by the armor and weapons you equip.

English: In the Equipment menu, you can equip weapons, armor, rings, gems and items.[n][n]Each piece of equipment in each category changes Massaru's strength in different ways. Weapons increase your attack power, armors increase your damage negation, rings and accessories grant you effects, gems grant effects to your weapon. All your equipment can give you other effects, such as a weapon giving you some effect, even if that's not its main function. The bag makes it easier for you to access items in your inventory.
Українська: In the Equipment menu, you can equip weapons, armor, rings, gems and items.[n][n]Each piece of equipment in each category changes Massaru's strength in different ways. Weapons increase your attack power, armors increase your damage negation, rings and accessories grant you effects, gems grant effects to your weapon. All your equipment can give you other effects, such as a weapon giving you some effect, even if that's not its main function. The bag makes it easier for you to access items in your inventory.

English: In my Inventory, you can check all the items you own.[n][n]You can use them, generating some kind of gain or loss, depending on the item. Equip them, so you don't have to go to the Equipment menu to equip the item you want. Even discard them, if you no longer want an item in your inventory, but bear in mind that doing so will discard all the items you have of that type, that is, discarding an item that you have 10 amounts of, for example, will cause all 10 of your amounts to be discarded.
Українська: In my Inventory, you can check all the items you own.[n][n]You can use them, generating some kind of gain or loss, depending on the item. Equip them, so you don't have to go to the Equipment menu to equip the item you want. Even discard them, if you no longer want an item in your inventory, but bear in mind that doing so will discard all the items you have of that type, that is, discarding an item that you have 10 amounts of, for example, will cause all 10 of your amounts to be discarded.

English: In the Bestiary menu, you can check out all the monsters you've encountered so far.[n][n]Here you can find out more about the monsters, their names, types, history, HP and attack power, damage negation and how many times you've defeated them.
Українська: In the Bestiary menu, you can check out all the monsters you've encountered so far.[n][n]Here you can find out more about the monsters, their names, types, history, HP and attack power, damage negation and how many times you've defeated them.

English: Hello tester, how are you? This map was made to test all the mechanics of Hell's Voyager so far.[n]Commands you may need:[n]B key: Reset the game;[n]F4 key: Activate FPS real, Date, time and game time;[n]F3: Activate hit box and game infos.
Українська: Hello tester, how are you? This map was made to test all the mechanics of Hell's Voyager so far.[n]Commands you may need:[n]B key: Reset the game;[n]F4 key: Activate FPS real, Date, time and game time;[n]F3: Activate hit box and game infos.

English: Please understand that the game is "empty" because I've only focused on the game menus so far! But from now on I'm focusing on gameplay, equipment, maps and enemies.[n]Most of the weapons and armor are missing their images, animations and descriptions because I haven't worked on them yet (the only one that already has a move set is the Worn Bastard Sword, but it hasn't been properly finalized). I'm focusing first on adding new things that are more important to the game's progress, such as maps, enemies, npcs, etc.
Українська: Please understand that the game is "empty" because I've only focused on the game menus so far! But from now on I'm focusing on gameplay, equipment, maps and enemies.[n]Most of the weapons and armor are missing their images, animations and descriptions because I haven't worked on them yet (the only one that already has a move set is the Worn Bastard Sword, but it hasn't been properly finalized). I'm focusing first on adding new things that are more important to the game's progress, such as maps, enemies, npcs, etc.
